subject: Baseball
Weather
lead_paragraph: The Mets, returning to Colorado to make up a game that was postponed because of a snowstorm, prevailed after Marlon Byrd hit a two-run home run in the eighth.
snippet: The Mets, returning to Colorado to make up a game that was postponed because of a snowstorm, prevailed after Marlon Byrd hit a two-run home run in the eighth.
